data.productDescription: Efficient 23.8'' Monitor: Enhance your productivity with the 23.8'' MSI monitor, perfect for desktops and laptops with a standard VESA mount. This professional-grade deskptop monitor combines style with functionality for a great work experience. Smooth Full HD Monitor For Laptop: Elevate your viewing experience with this Full HD (1920x1080) computer monitor. With a fast 4ms response time and 75Hz refresh rate, this MSI monitor offers smooth and strain-free visuals. Eye-Friendly Monitor Technology: Experience visual comfort and prevent eye fatigue with the Anti-Flicker and Less Blue Light technologies of this 24-inch TFT monitor for computer. Enjoy extended hours of use with its eye-friendly features while ensuring the finest image quality. Flexible Connectivity Options: The 24-inch computer screen monitor comes with dual sources of connectivity, including HDMI and D-Sub (VGA) interfaces, making it flexible and compatible with a variety of devices. Ergonomic Monitor for Healthy Viewing: This TÜV certified LED monitor for laptop protects your eyesight from glare, ensuring healthy eyes. Ideal for extended screen hours, this 24 inch computer screen monitor is a must-have for any desktop setup.
